name: Pep pig the gaem: Lost Bacon
name_original: Pep pig the gaem: Lost Bacon
description:
oh no, you decided to eat some bacon but your evil mom and dad locked you in basement for that, you need to get out of basement and kick your parents ass game contains:

-2 levels
-epic boss fight
-3 awesome endings
-bacon
and awfull level desing

can you beat parents and eat your bacon? play and find out
